charges.charge_description: On or about November 20, 2016, in the Western District of Missouri, the defendant MANUEL CRESPO, having been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, did knowingly possess, in and affecting interstate commerce, a firearm, to wit: a silver Smith and Wesson .32 caliber revolver, bearing serial number 915466, contrary to the provisions of Title 18, United States Code, Sections 922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2).
